the §6Soul Binder§r is a §esoul-typed machine§r. It is commonly used in §aconverting §6Broken Spawner§as into their appropriate types with the help of §6Soul Vials§r. Though, you can also use it to make items such as §6Frank'N'Zombie§r, §6Sentient Ender§r, and §6Mob Tokens§r.

To craft it, you'll need you'll need four §6Soularium Ingot§rs, a §6Soul Machine Chassis§r, an §6Enderman Head§r, §6Creeper Head§r, §6Zombie Head§r, and a §6Skeleton Skull§r.
